check_box.label: Show Favorites Panel
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the favorites row in the navigationbar at the top of the Viewer.
check_box.name: ShowNavbarFavoritesPanel

check_box.label: Enable Navbar Parcel Properties
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of extended info in the navigationbar, such as whether scripts are allowed or not, for the current parcel you are in.
check_box.name: NavBarShowParcelProperties

check_box.label: Enable Navbar Coordinates
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of coordinates in the navigationbar.
check_box.name: NavBarShowCoordinates

check_box.label: Show FPS Counter
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the framerate counter in the statusbar.
check_box.name: ShowFPSCounter

check_box.label: Show Network Stats (top right)
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the 2 small network statistic bars in the bottom right corner of the navigationbar at the top.
check_box.name: ShowNetStats

check_box.label: Show Menu Filter in the Navigationbar
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of a filter editor allowing you to filter the main menu via search terms.
check_box.name: MenuSearch

check_box.label: Show Search Bar in the Navigationbar
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of a seperate search bar that can be used to search for terms in Second Life. This is essentially the same as using the search window.
check_box.name: ShowTopSearchBar

check_box.label: Allow searching in the Navigationbar
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the Viewer is allowed to automatically search for something you entered in the Navigationbar when it didn't match with an existing SIM name.
check_box.name: SearchFromAddressBar

check_box.label: Use Action Wheel
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether you want to use the right click action wheel (aka Pie Menu) or not. ||<icon>Caution_Widget_Mini</icon> Caution Badge |This feature is known to cause random crashes on right click use at your own risk.
check_box.name: UsePieMenu

slider.label: Popup time (s):
slider.tool_tip: This option controls how long it takes in s (seconds) for the action wheel popup animation to finish.
slider.name: pie_menu_popup_time

slider.label: Tooltip Delay
slider.name: ToolTipDelay
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the time in s (seconds) it takes before a tooltip is shown when hovering your mouse over something. This option is subject to the tooltip options below.

slider.label: Tooltip Fade Time
slider.name: ToolTipFadeTime
slider.tool_tip: This option controls how long it takes in s (seconds) for any tooltip to fade away when it is no longer used.

slider.label: Tooltip Show Time
slider.name: ToolTipVisibleTimeFar
slider.tool_tip: This option controls how long it takes in s (seconds) for tooltips to start fading away when the mouse has been moved away from the hovered object.

slider.label: Tooltip Auto Fade
slider.name: ToolTipVisibleTimeNear
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the time it takes in s (seconds) before any tooltip will automatically start fading away even if the mouse was not moved away.

slider.label: Inspector Fade Time
slider.name: InspectorFadeTime
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the amount of time it takes in s (seconds) for any inspector (mouse-over mini profiles of objects, land and avatars) to fade away when they are no longer used.

slider.label: Inspector Show Time
slider.name: InspectorShowTime
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the time it takes in s (seconds) before inspectors (mouse-over mini profiles of objects, land and avatars) will automatically start fading away even if the mouse has not been moved away.

check_box.label: Rotating Minimap
check_box.name: MiniMapRotate
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the minimap should rotate with your camera turns or not.

check_box.label: Double-click on Minimap opens World-Map
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether a left mouse double-click will open the world map or not, this option overrides the double-click teleport behavior.
check_box.name: DoubleClickShowWorldMap

check_box.label: Show Minimap in People floater
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the minimap in the 'People' window in the 'Nearby' tab.
check_box.name: ShowSidebarMinimap

check_box.label: Display Chat range rings in Minimap
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of rings on the minimap that indicate the different chat ranges for shouting, chatting or whispering.
check_box.name: MiniMapChatRing

slider.label: Max Prim Size on Minimap:
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the maximum size in m (meters) a single object will be displayed as on the minimap. Objects bigger than this value will be cut down to this value allowing to see objects on the minimap even if megaprims cover the entire region.
slider.name: InactiveFloaterTransparency

slider.label: Unfocused:
slider.name: InactiveFloaterTransparency
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the opacity of all currently focused windows.

slider.label: Focused:
slider.name: ActiveFloaterTransparency
slider.tool_tip: This option controls the opacity of windows that are currently not focused.

check_box.label: Scripts can interact with the UI
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether inworld scripts are allowed to open interface windows (world map for instance) or not.
check_box.name: ScriptsCanShowUI

check_box.label: Show Status Button Container
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the Viewer should display status buttons at the bottom indicating affecting statuses such as sitting, running and flying.
check_box.name: ShowStatusButtonContainer

check_box.label: Show Performance Rank indicators on nametags
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the Viewer should show an avatar performance indicator next to the name, the performance rank is based on the avatar's complexity.
check_box.name: EnablePerformanceRanking

check_box.label: Enable User Interface Tooltips
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether tooltips should be shown when hovering the mouse over any interface widget such as a button, checkbox, slider and so on.
check_box.name: BasicUITooltips

check_box.label: Enable Mouseover Inspectors
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether inspectors (mini-profiles) should be shown when hovering the mouse over an avatar. This option is required for the other inspector options to work.
check_box.name: ShowHoverTips

check_box.label: Show Land Inspectors
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether inspectors (mini-profiles) should be shown when hovering the mouse over terrain. This option requires mouseover inspectors to be enabled to work.
check_box.name: ShowLandHoverTip

check_box.label: Show Inspectors on everything
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether inspectors (mini-profiles) should be shown when hovering the mouse over objects. This option requires mouseover inspectors to be enabled to work.
check_box.name: ShowAllHoverTips

radio_item.label: Start IM
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the default double-click action in avatar lists to opening an IM conversation.
radio_item.name: IM

radio_item.label: Zoom In
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the default double-click action in avatar lists to zooming in on the avatar. Note that this will do nothing if the avatar is not in render range. It is subject to the same limitations as the 'Zoom In' option.
radio_item.name: ZoomIn

radio_item.label: Open Profile
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the default double-click action in avatar lists to opening the avatar's profile.
radio_item.name: OpenProfile

check_box.label: Enable 'Copy as Link' Feature in Inventory
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the 'Copy as Link' option in inventory is enabled or not.
check_box.name: InventoryLinking

check_box.label: Preview offered Inventory items if possible when accepting them
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether we should preview the received item if possible or not. This only works on previewable inventory types such as sounds, notecards, textures and so on and works regardless of whether the Inventory is open or not.
check_box.name: ShowOfferedInventory

check_box.label: Highlight received items in Inventory when clicking a missed inventory offer in IM
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether we should open the Inventory (if not already) and highlight the received item when clicking a missed inventory offer in a private conversation. Note: This does not affect the actual Inventory offer notifications on screen and neither those displayed when the inventory offer arives while the conversation with the offering agent is opened, only when the conversation was not active and the inventory offer was missed.
check_box.name: ShowOfferedInventory

check_box.label: Auto accept Inventory offers
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether inventory offers for notecards, textures and landmarks should automatically be accepted. This option technically does nothing since all inventory offers are automatically accepted until declined anyway, it only hides the message.
check_box.name: AutoAcceptNewInventory

check_box.label: Disable Library in Inventory
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the 'Library' folder in your inventory. This option needs a restart.
check_box.name: NoInventoryLibrary

check_box.label: Show Merchant Outbox and Received Items (Inbox) in Inventory
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles the visibility of the Received Items and Merchant Outbox folders used for the viewer-managed marketplace features. Note that the Inbox might be labeled as Inbox or Received Items depending on when it was created. This option needs a restart.
check_box.name: InventoryOutboxMakeVisible

check_box.label: Allow 'Return' key to execute the default inventory item action
check_box.tool_tip: This option toggles whether the Viewer should open/attach/wear/add/preview a selected item in Inventory when pressing the return key.
check_box.name: AllowReturnInInventory

radio_item.label: Wear Item
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the default double-click action to wearing items and replacing any on the same slot.
radio_item.name: Wear

radio_item.label: Add Item
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets default double-click action to adding items without replacing any items on the same slot.
radio_item.name: Add

radio_item.label: Open Properties
radio_item.tool_tip: This option sets the default double-click action to opening the item's properties page.
radio_item.name: Properties
